title: Potion of power

properties.name: description
properties.value: A potion of power is a potion exclusive to Soul Wars, obtained from the table of potions of power at the player's base. The potion combines the effects of a super combat, super ranging, super magic, and super restore potion.

SMW Subobject for (1)Examine: Gives a helpful boost.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Potion of powerUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Potion of power(1).pngWeight: 0.035Value: 1Version anchor: 1 doseRelease date: 6 January 2021Item ID: 25206

A potion of power is a potion exclusive to Soul Wars, obtained from the table of potions of power at the player's base. The potion combines the effects of a super combat, super ranging, super magic, and super restore potion.

When a game of Soul Wars ends, all gameplay items in the player's inventory are removed, including the potion of power. All boosts acquired from drinking it are removed as well.

Contents

  • 1 Effects
    • 1.1 Melee boost
    • 1.2 Ranged boost
    • 1.3 Magic boost
    • 1.4 Stat restoration
    • 1.5 Prayer restoration
  • 2 Changes

Effects[edit | edit source]

Melee boost[edit | edit source]

Stat boosts to Attack, Strength and Defence are calculated with: ⌊ S k i l l L e v e l × 15 100 ⌋ + 5 {\displaystyle \lfloor SkillLevel\times {\frac {15}{100}}\rfloor +5}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-6 +5 34-39 +10 67-73 +15
7-13 +6 40-46 +11 74-79 +16
14-19 +7 47-53 +12 80-86 +17
20-26 +8 54-59 +13 87-93 +18
27-33 +9 60-66 +14 94-99 +19

Ranged boost[edit | edit source]

Ranged boost is calculated with: ⌊ R a n g e d L e v e l × 15 100 ⌋ + 5 {\displaystyle \lfloor RangedLevel\times {\frac {15}{100}}\rfloor +5}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-6 +5 34-39 +10 67-73 +15
7-13 +6 40-46 +11 74-79 +16
14-19 +7 47-53 +12 80-86 +17
20-26 +8 54-59 +13 87-93 +18
27-33 +9 60-66 +14 94-99 +19

Magic boost[edit | edit source]

Magic boost is calculated with: ⌊ M a g i c L e v e l × 15 100 ⌋ + 5 {\displaystyle \lfloor MagicLevel\times {\frac {15}{100}}\rfloor +5}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-6 +5 34-39 +10 67-73 +15
7-13 +6 40-46 +11 74-79 +16
14-19 +7 47-53 +12 80-86 +17
20-26 +8 54-59 +13 87-93 +18
27-33 +9 60-66 +14 94-99 +19

Stat restoration[edit | edit source]

Stat restore is calculated with: ⌊ L e v e l × 1 4 ⌋ + 8 {\displaystyle \lfloor Level\times {\frac {1}{4}}\rfloor +8}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-3 +8 36-39 +17 72-75 +26
4-7 +9 40-43 +18 76-79 +27
8-11 +10 44-47 +19 80-83 +28
12-15 +11 48-51 +20 84-87 +29
16-19 +12 52-55 +21 88-91 +30
20-23 +13 56-59 +22 92-95 +31
24-27 +14 60-63 +23 96-99 +32
28-31 +15 64-67 +24
32-35 +16 68-71 +25

Prayer restoration[edit | edit source]

If a ring of the gods (i) or Prayer cape is equipped, or alternatively if a Prayer cape or holy wrench is in the player's inventory, the amount of restored Prayer points is calculated with: ⌊ P r a y e r L e v e l × 27 100 ⌋ + 8 {\displaystyle \lfloor PrayerLevel\times {\frac {27}{100}}\rfloor +8}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-3 +8 34-37 +17 67-70 +26
4-7 +9 38-40 +18 71-74 +27
8-11 +10 41-44 +19 75-77 +28
12-14 +11 45-48 +20 78-81 +29
15-18 +12 49-51 +21 82-85 +30
19-22 +13 52-55 +22 86-88 +31
23-25 +14 56-59 +23 89-92 +32
26-29 +15 60-62 +24 93-96 +33
30-33 +16 63-66 +25 97-99 +34

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
3 March 2021
(update)

The 'Destroy' option of all four doses of the potion was changed to 'Drop'.

6 January 2021
(update)

The item is now obtainable by players.

9 December 2020
(update)

The item was added to the game.

A '''potion of power''' is a [[potion]] exclusive to [[Soul Wars]], obtained from the table of potions of power at the player's base. The potion combines the effects of a [[super combat]], [[super ranging]], [[super magic]], and [[super restore]] potion.

When a game of Soul Wars ends, all gameplay items in the player's [[inventory]] are removed, including the potion of power. All boosts acquired from drinking it are removed as well.

==Effects==
===Melee boost===
Stat boosts to Attack, Strength and Defence are calculated with: <math>\lfloor SkillLevel \times \frac{15}{100} \rfloor + 5</math>
